items.name: False Appearance
entries: While the terracotta warrior remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a terracotta statue.

items.name: Fragile
entries: If a critical hit is scored against the terracotta warrior, it shatters and is destroyed.

items.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.
